title: Ripple's David Schwartz Talks 'Bottom-Up Growth' on XRP Ledger, Rebuts Critics: Q&A
description: Schwartz spoke to The Protocol about the aftermath of Ripple's SEC win, his method for dealing with XRP's rabid fanbase, the XRP Ledger's controversial approach to centralization, and more.

title: Crypto Needs Cohesive Regulation – A Look at Europe’s MiCA
description: From the U.S. to South Asia, jurisdictions are creating a patchwork of  crypto regulatory regimes, making international business harder. Europe, with its bloc-wide Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA), is different.

title: Do Bitcoin ETFs Kill the Bull Case for Crypto Equities?
description: The days of rising crypto prices lifting all boats, including mining stocks, may be gone. But it still looks like being a good year for digital assets, says Alex Tapscott.

title: The Biggest Nintendo Games Still Coming Before the Switch 2
description: UPDATED: The Nintendo Switch 2 is reportedly on the horizon, but original Switch owners will have promising games ahead.

title: Gold will outperform Bitcoin in 2024, Bloomberg analyst predicts
description:
Macroeconomic factors pressure Bitcoin's price in 2024 despite the bullish narratives, says senior commodity strategist at Bloomberg Intelligence, Mike McGlone.

Bitcoin (BTC) is likely to underperform the stock market on a risk-adjusted basis in 2024, while gold may come out ahead, says Bloomberg's senior commodity strategist Mike McGlone. 

Despite the bullish narrative around the recent spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) approval and the upcoming Bitcoin halving, macroeconomic factors may prevent the largest cryptocurrency from reaching new all-time highs in 2024.

In particular, McGlone believes market expectations that the Fed will cut interest rates, which usually has a boosting effect on risk-on assets like Bitcoin, are largely misplaced.

Read more
